cheatsheet.title: Viewing Registers and Symbian OS Data

intro.description: Read the following information to view registers and Symbian OS Data during a run mode debug session.

item.title: Viewing Registers
item.description: Click question mark on right side for information about registers.

item.title: Viewing Symbian OS Data
item.description: Click question mark on right side for information about viewing Symbian OS Data such as processes, threads, chunks, and libraries.

item.title: Troubleshooting On-Device Debugging
item.description: Click question mark on right side for troubleshooting information.
